timeout_ms.description: Timeout for Faramesh API calls in milliseconds

fail_closed.description: Block tool calls when Faramesh is unreachable (true) or allow them (false)

agent_id_override.description: Override the agent ID sent to Faramesh (defaults to session agent ID)

api_key.description: Optional API key for Faramesh authentication

wait_for_approval_ms.description: If > 0, poll Faramesh for a decision on pending_approval for this many ms; if 0, block immediately and ask the user to approve in the dashboard.

dashboard_url.description: Dashboard URL for "approve here" links (defaults to base_url with port 3000).
